Formation of the government is necessary, is adherence to a minister or a condition or portfolio more important than sticking to Lebanon?
Constitutional entitlements must be applied and implemented, because the citizen groans of fear, murder and terrorism, and moans from hunger and the economic situation
We want a "qualitative" weapon that enables us to confront Israel, so that we will become the only force on the ground to deal with Israeli attacks
Internal conditions are set up through the Baabda Declaration, the Defense Strategy and the National Memorandum of Bkerki. We have no reason to prevent the formation of a government
We must prove that we can build a state, form governments, elect parliamentary presidents and councils, and not extend, and we can control the Constitutional Council and not boycott it.
It is shameful to delay the formation of the government and to show less concern than the world and the international community have for Lebanon
